short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Archery Master 3D is the hottest and most realistic archery simulation game with stunning 3D graphics and amazing animations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Game Instructions**
Move mouse to aim your arrow at the target, and overcome the blow of the wind!
